评论概述: Fit is off but worked for me
评论详情: I wear us 12 and ordered 14/16 since it was dress sizing. I noticed the arms were a bit tight and the band was at my rib cage. It was “special” getting in and out of the dress. But when it was on, I received nothing but compliments. I also noticed that I didn’t need to hem the dress (sign #2). Well, I’m short and the dress is even shorter. The band at my ribs is supposed to be the waist band not under the boob. It’s almost like the dress is a medium and mislabeled. So although it didn’t fit like it was supposed to, it did work out fine and I was encouraged to keep it.

I ordered this dress based on other reviews but still didn’t have high hopes. Boy was I wrong!!! This dress was a top pocket find. The length was perfect (with or without heels, I’m 5’4) The zipper was challenging going over the seam but my friend helped. I ate and danced a lot and it was completely comfortable (my top priority) and beautiful 🤩 I got a lot of compliments. Go ahead and get this dress, you won’t regret it!

This dress is everything everyone has stated. Value: Amazing Material: Thin but very workable Color: EVERYTHING 🔥 Wearability: She fits and flows as she should. Simply beautiful. I purchased a large because I'm top heavy. Great fit. I love it!

This is a stunning dress that complements my figure. However, as was mentioned in several other reviews the zipper is awful. YOU WILL NEED HELP zipping it up/down even though you bought the appropriate size. I had a on site wedding to do (hair/makeup) and the bride was gracious enough to invite me to the festivities. I didn’t wear the dress while working for obvious reasons however after the bridal party left the suites and lined up for the wedding, I attempted to get dressed. Epic failure with the zipper. I needed help and housekeeping was taking forever to come (I waited 20 minutes for them while trying to zip it myself to no avail) to the room so I flagged down a 80 year old janitor who had arthritis 😣 I ended up wearing a shrug over the unzipped dress with my boob hanging out until the reception and someone could help zip it for me. This is a beautiful dress however if you choose to proceed forward with this purchase, take it to a seamstress so they can change the zipper. Also it’s a little on the sheer side (the dress has a built in slip but depending on how tall you are, it stops mid thigh)
